str.o: SQL databases provides symbolic names to any number of database URLs. The symbolic names can later be used instead of the database URL. This makes it unnecessary to store full database URLs in RXML pages, which enhances security. It also becomes possible to change database without having to change any RXML pages.

The table with database URLs in the format:
name	URL
The database URL is specified as driver://user name:password@host:port/database.
